amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to investment in Alzheimer's disease research.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 427 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 427 proposed by Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S1969-1970; text: CR S1969) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to investment in Alzheimer's disease research.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 427 proposed by Senator Collins.
